introduction: There is a fine line between justice and revenge...it depends whose side you're onJonah is a skilled hit man, being pursued from a crime scene at high speed by police. Things go from bad to worse when he collides with a utility on a country road. Two innocent lives are lost, father and daughter Ben and Claire Rogen. Now on the run the hunter becomes the hunted and through a series of events Jonah finds himself being delivered to and held captive by grieving wife and  mother, Marie Rogen, a  woman devastated by her loss, ridden with  her own guilt and barely  hanging on to her own sanity.
